avalancheActivity.highlights: The old snow is generally considered stable after thaw. Little new snow is in the area.

snowpackStructure.highlights: Snow subsided and melted in thaw. The remaining snow is mostly considered homogeneous and stable. A little new snow  in mountains.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Lítilsháttar éljagangur fram á fimmtudag og fer þá hlýnandi. Lægð yfir landinu á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow after N-NE snow showers, thinn slabs may be expected in southerly aspects. Older snow is mostly homogeneous and stable after thaw. Becoming warmer with rain on Friday and the snowpack can be unstable at first.

snowpackStructure.highlights: New snow after N-NE snow showers on Sunday and Monday. Unstable thinn wind slabs may be expected in southerly aspects. Older snow is homogeneous and grainy. Becoming warmer with rain on Friday and the snowpack can be unstable at first.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlægar áttir og lítlsháttar él. Hlýnar með rigningu á föstudag.

avalancheActivity.highlights: It has snowed on top of the old hard packed snow and wind slabs could be present.

snowpackStructure.highlights: It has snowed on top of the old snow and small wind slabs could have formed on most aspects. The bond between the new snow and the old snow is unknown.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Suðlægar áttir og él fram á föstudag. Á föstudag gengur lægð yfir landið með hlýindum og rigningu en mögulega snjókomu til fjalla.

avalancheActivity.comment: Multiple thin avalanches released in Seldalur and Fannardalur in Norðfjörður on Saturday morning, 22.2. They all started at high elevations on steep slopes. They released in various aspects.
avalancheActivity.highlights: New snow high in mountains may be unstable at first, and in the first sunshine. Older snow is mostly considered homogenous and stable.

snowpackStructure.highlights: There is little snow left in the lower parts of slopes. It snowed at high elevations over the weekend and the new snow can be unstable at first. The old snow is considered homogenous and stable.

travelAdvisory.comment: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.
travelAdvisory.highlights: New thin wind slabs may be present in the northern part of the country. Older snow is generally considered stable.

weatherForecast.highlights: Vestlægar eða breytilegar áttir næstu daga og líkur á dálítilli ofankomu. Hiti um og yfir frostmarki við sjávarmál en frost til fjalla. Á föstudag kemur lægð að landinu með S-átt, hlýnandi veðri og rigningu á láglendi.
